response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price. Considering its significance and the potential benefits it could bring to you, I propose a purchase price of $800,000. This offer reflects my desire to share this valuable asset with someone who appreciates its true worth and can make the most of it. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of a successful transaction. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 800000}
